column1: # start:                                The start coordinate of the window (0-based)
# end:                                  The end coordinate of the window
# aln.len:                              The length of the alignment
# seqs.above.repeat:                    The number of sequences in the alignment with a percentage of sites above the specified repeat threshold (-r)
# seqs.above.missing:                   The number of sequences in the alignment with a percentage of sites above the specified missing data threshold (-m)
# avg.seq.len.wo.missing:               The average length of all sequences in the alignment while excluding gaps or missing data (-
# uniq.seqs:                            The number of unique sequences in the alignment
# ident.seqs:                           The number of identical sequences in the alignment
# invariant.sites:                      The number of sites in the alignment with only 1 allele
# informative.sites:                    The number of sites in the alignment that have at least 2 alleles that are present in 2 species
# sites.w.missing:                      The number of sites in the alignment with at least one missing data character (-
# percent.sites.with.missing:           The percent of sites in the alignment with at least one missing data character (-
# sites.high.missing:                   The number of sites in the alignment that are made up of a high percentage of missing data characters (over -m)
# sites.all.missing:                    The number of sites in the alignment that are made up of all missing data characters
